price: (Nkͻmhyεni) suu nesε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn, weinom yε nkorͻfoͻ a wͻnnye nnie;
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
